March 18 (Reuters) - AVEVA Group PLC AVV.L:

  • AVEVA - PROVIDES UPDATE ON PROGRESS OF ACQUISITION OF OSISOFT

  • AVEVA - RECEIVED ALL ANTITRUST AND REGULATORY CLEARANCES REQUIRED AHEAD OF COMPLETION OF OSISOFT DEAL, INCLUDING CLEARANCE BY COMMITTEE ON CFIUS

Source text for Eikon: (Full Story)

Further company coverage: AVV.L
